long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension is a tool designed to help users create secure and customizable passwords. The user interface includes several options for tailoring the password to specific needs:

Checkbox Options: Users can select from the following settings:

Include Letters: Allows lowercase letters in the password.
Include Capital Letters: Adds uppercase letters to the password.
Include Numbers: Adds numeric characters.
Include Special Characters: Adds symbols like @, #, $, etc., for additional security.
Password Length Input: Users can specify the desired password length by entering a number (default shown is 12 characters).

The interface is clean and user-friendly, providing options to make a unique, secure password with minimal effort. This extension is ideal for users looking to enhance their online security by creating complex, customizable passwords.
